## DateTimeFormatter type

### DateTimeFormatter type

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
export declare type DateTimeFormatter<T extends DateTimeOptions = DateTimeOptions> = (dateInUtc: DateTimeInput, options?: T) => string;
```

import { DateTimeFormatter } from '@grafana/data';
